response.original_title: The Hitman's Bodyguard: The Hitman vs. The Bodyguard
response.overview: Ryan Reynolds and Samuel L. Jackson star as an elite bodyguard and renowned hit man who is forced to work together. In order to succeed, they don't just have to avoid getting killed, they have to avoid killing each other.
response.title: The Hitman's Bodyguard: The Hitman vs. The Bodyguard
